power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/blue_tr: Оскільки ви зроблені з льоду, ви блакитні і трохи прозорі!
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/cold_po: Перебуваючи в будь-якому холодному біомі, ви отримаєте бафи.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/freeze_: Ви не отримаєте ніякої шкоди від замерзання.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/frostwa: You can toggle frost walker for three minutes, with a cooldown.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/heal_ne: Ви зцілитесь, коли будете поруч зі сніговим големом.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/hot_bio: Ваш організм не любить тепле середовище, через що ви швидше втрачаєте голод і слабшаєте.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/pyropho: Ви отримуєте більшу шкоду від усього вогню, включаючи лаву, блискавки, вибухи та феєрверки.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/unresol: Коли ви відроджуєтесь, ваша висота випадково визначається в межах від одного до трьох блоків. Максимальний запас здоров’я також залежить від вашого розміру.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/warp.de: Телепортуйтеся до істоти, на яку ви дивитесь. Якщо ви схибите, то опинитесь біля найближчої істоти.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/co: У холодних біомах ви отримуєте Швидкість, а в гарячих біомах ви страждаєте від Голоду.
Ви змушуєте воду замерзати навколо себе.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/ic: Ви отримуєте набагато більше шкоди від вогню.
Ви завдаєте трохи більше шкоди, коли б'єте порожньою рукою.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/mu: Випустіть кілька шипів, які уповільнюють ворогів.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/sm: Ви зростом в один блок, але можете стрибати і бігати швидше і вище за інших.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/va: Використовуючи свої демонічні сили, ви маніпулюєте льодом, щоб викривляти світло навколо себе, стаючи невидимим на короткий час.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/blue_tra: Оскільки ти зроблений з льоду, ти блакитний і прозорий!
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/cold_spe: У холодних біомах ви завдаєте більше шкоди.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/fire.des: Ви отримуєте подвійну шкоду від вогню.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/harvest_: Ви можете збирати сніг і голими руками.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/hot_biom: Ваше тіло не любить тепле середовище, тому в теплих біомах, таких як пустелі або Незер, ви швидше втрачаєте голод.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/nib.desc: Через невеликий розмір ви не зазнаєте шкоди від кактусів, солодких ягід і шипів.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/nib.name: Малий
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/no_hunge: As you are smaller, you do not need to eat as much.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/shard.de: You can shoot shards of ice.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/snow_spa: Since you are made of ice, you spawn in a snowy biome.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/water.de: You get Water Breathing as you have no nose.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/archdem: As an archdemon, you are larger and have longer arms that can reach further.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/brawler: Your proficiency in ranged weapons is significantly compromised due to your massive and clumsy arms, so your ranged damage is halved.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/crimson: Your hell-spawn origin gives you a red hue.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/diaboli: As a demonic being, both hunger and gravity are trivial to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/extingu: The water extinguishes your flames, slowing you. You also cannot swim as you lack buoyancy.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/hades_h: Launch yourself into the air. While you are in Wrath mode, a much shorter cooldown is used instead.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/hades_t: The earth will tremble, and your enemies shaken to their very core. Hold to launch yourself downwards and demolish those fools who dare stand on your ground.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/heavywe: Your armored body comes at the cost of speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/ignisia: Unleash the power that the gods once feared. Rampage through your enemies and gain a shorter cooldown for the 'Hades Hopper' ability. All attackers get hit by guaranteed thorns (can stack with normal thorns) and set on fire. Take 80% less damage, move 50% faster, and resist knockback. Consumes [100] Zenith points when hit and [4] Zenith points every tick while active.

You are the Zenith of all; none can stand in your way. Take damage to fill the 'Ignisian Zenith' bar. You regenerate health every three seconds of varying amplification depending on how full the bar is.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/inferna: As inhabitants of Hell, Hellfire is ineffective against you. In fact, you thrive in those scorching flames.
A larger size warrants a larger jump. You can jump half a block higher with your powerful legs.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/predato: Як хижа демонічна істота, ви можете споживати лише плоть своєї здобичі.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/punishe: Розплата значно послабила вас. Вибухи, магія та блискавки завдають вам значно більше шкоди.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/sluggis: Your sluggish arms slow down your break and attack speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/bette: Оскільки ви такий маніпулятор, ви можете маніпулювати головами людей. Ви стріляєте променем, який викликає нудоту у жертви.
Spawn [4] copies of yourself. To remove the illusion, press [Save Toolbar Activator].
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/bow_a: Because you are trained with bows, they do more damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/bow_m: Because you are now a master with bows, they do even more damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/frien: Pillagers, who are usually foes, are now friendly to you (as you are one of them).
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/illus: Spawn [2] copies of yourself. To remove the illusion, press [Save Toolbar Activator].
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/scary: Iron Golems will attack you on sight.
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/sword: You are inexperienced at using swords, so they do less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/villa: Because you are a pillager, villagers will not trade with you.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/ankle_bit: You gain life by hitting other entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/flap.desc: When jumping in the air, you are launched slightly in the direction of your cursor. You also glide for a short time after.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/flap.name: Flap
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/health.de: You have reduced health compared to a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/height.de: You are smaller than the average person due to evolution.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/lava.name: Insect's Step
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/rain_slow: You are very small; water slows you down.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/speed.des: Your small stature allows you to move quicker.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/water_slo: You are very small, so water slows you down.
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/aquati: You find dried kelp delicious and nutritious!
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/dry.de: You dry out if you are out of water for too long.
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/little: You are a tiny little blob.
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/stinge: Your touch paralyzes and poisons upon contact.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/aqua_po: Your heart of the sea core lets you use a nautilus shell on your neck (head slot) to breathe on land.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/conduit: With your core being a heart of the sea, you permanently have the effects of a conduit when in water.
Через безліч випадкових предметів, що плавають у воді, ви звикли підбирати випадкові речі поблизу себе (дальність підбору збільшилася вдвічі). Ви також опускаєтеся на дно водойм через те, що не вмієте плавати (на швидкість впливає глибинний страйдер).
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/lunge.d: Ви можете виконати водний ривок, щоб краще перетинати океан.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/mobile_: [Зберегти активатор панелі інструментів] Ви можете надати гравцям, що знаходяться поблизу (15 блоків), на 3 хвилини Силу морів.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/no_helm: Ви не можете носити шоломи, тому що ваші оборки з водоростей і серця моря повинні бути відкриті на вашій голові. Вам також потрібно, щоб ваше ліжко було біля води, щоб мати можливість спати, не висихаючи.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/shell_e: Використовуйте, тримаючи мушлю наутилуса, щоб вставити її в гніздо шолома
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/standin: Ваше ядро серце моря може використовувати енергію необроблених блоків призмарину, надаючи вам силу і швидкість, коли ви стоїте на ньому.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/thin.de: Ви тонші за інших, що дозволяє вам поміщатися в тісному просторі.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/water_v: [Завантажити активатор панелі інструментів] Оскільки ваше ядро - це серце моря, ви постійно відчуваєте вплив провідника, коли перебуваєте у воді.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/cat_size.d: You are cat sized; a block tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/climb.desc: [Save Toolbar Activator] You are fast at will and can climb blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/climb.name: Climb
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/dislike_of: You hate the water, gaining Slowness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/jump_boost: You can launch yourself due to your strong legs and nature.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/unrivaled_: As a special ability, you gain high speed for a short time.
You get Slowness II while on land.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/gill_: You can breathe on land and in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/greed: Ви зголоднієте в 1,5 раза швидше й отримаєте ефект голоду на суші.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/razor: Ви завдаєте додаткової шкоди від атаки.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/speed: Ви отримуєте грацію дельфіна під час занурення у воду.
[Secondary + Shift] Ви можете дати насичення, регенерацію і опір всім в межах 6 блоків.
[Primary + Shift] Ви можете перетворити книгу на Книгу магів, маючи під рукою книгу.
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/clear: [Primary + Shift] Ви можете видалити статусні ефекти з сутностей у межах 12 блоків.
Ви можете застосувати заклинання зцілення, яке завдає шкоди нежиті (Дальність: 80 блоків)
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/damag: Ви завдаєте на 50% менше фізичної шкоди.
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/dimin: Ви можете застосувати заклинання дебаффа, яке також впливає на вас. (Дальність: 80 блоків)
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/illum: Ви можете змусити світитися всі об'єкти в радіусі 80 блоків, а також надати нічне бачення об'єктам у радіусі 8 блоків, використовуючи [Secondary + Shift].
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/mage_: [Primary] + [Shift] Ви можете перетворити книгу, що знаходиться у вас в руках, на Книгу заклинань мага.
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/no_ra: Ви не можете використовувати далекобійну зброю.
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/resou: У вас є смужка мани - якщо у вас закінчиться мана, ви помрете.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/l: Ви можете запустити себе на 20 блоків у повітря
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/p: Завдяки тому, що ви були старим драконіанцем, ви зберегли ті ж характеристики, які мали за життя.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/r: Попри свою силу, ви були коротуном, меншим за більшість представників свого виду. Ви лише трохи вищий за блок.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/s: Ви звикли до холоду Енду і не звикли до верхнього світу, Після довгого перебування на сонці, ви отримуєте Повільність I.
Ви звикли падати у великі прірви, поранивши крила, але завдяки тому, що ви привид, тепер вам не боляче.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/t: Драконіанці були меншими двоюрідними братами ендеріанців, вони також могли телепортуватися на невеликі відстані.
Ваша шкіра напівпрозора і трохи фіолетова, бо ви - привид
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/u: Вогонь - це не те, що у вас було в Енду, тому ви отримуєте 2x шкоди від вогню.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/w: Ви наносите додаткову шкоду мечем, оскільки в минулому були воїном.
Через вашу маленьку статуру ваше здоров'я було ослаблене. У вас на два серця менше.
Як член драконіанського війська, ви були благословенні власним мечем і щитом, які були виготовлені особисто для вас, однак через свій вік вони стали досить крихкими.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/chain: Стріляйте ланцюгами в тих напрямках, куди ви дивитеся. Вони пробиватимуть усіх мобів на своєму шляху. Всі уражені моби отримають ефект висушування. Використовуйте також [Shift], щоб зробити так, що якщо ланцюг зіткнеться з землею, він спричинить вибух.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/curse: Ви отримуєте підвищену шкоду, яка ігнорує броню, від зброї, зачарованої заклинанням "Небесна кара".
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/exile: Ціни в селах підвищені, а залізні големи атакують вас на кожному кроці.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/from_: [Завантажити активатор панелі інструментів] Ваша вроджена здатність до некромантії дозволяє вам викликати з могили броньованого скелета і броньованого зомбі, щоб вони билися на вашому боці.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/no_da: Ви отримуєте шкоду від води, але тільки вдень.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/pluck: Оскільки залізо є дуже провідним, воно заряджає меч темною енергією, завдяки чому він завдає такої ж шкоди, як і меч з незериту.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/summo: Ви викликаєте ікла вовкулаки на 3 ворогів, що знаходяться поруч, але тільки вночі!
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/sunli: Ваша шкіра крихка під впливом денного світла, що призводить до опіків, коли ви перебуваєте під ним. Чим довше ви перебуваєте під ним, тим слабкішими і повільнішими стаєте.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/weake: Ви отримуєте подвійну шкоду від усіх мобів.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/antivore: Ваш організм не може перетравити жодної їжі, лише поглинає лаву.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/bouncy.d: Ви підстрибуєте на будь-якому блоці (так, ніби це слизовий блок)
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/drop_loo: When hit, you have a small chance of dropping magma cream.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/lava_fee: While unable to eat typical foods, by submerging yourself in lava, you can refuel.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/no_fall_: Kinetic damage is absorbed by your gelatinous form and does no harm to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/call: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can teleport the last entity you punched to you. Use [Shift] too to teleport to it instead.
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/floa: Ви можете плавати (але це занадто виснажливо, щоб літати довго).
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/part: Ви природно маєте частинки навколо себе.
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/phas: You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/rand: When you take damage from anything (other than water), you randomly teleport nearby.
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/cycl:
Ви можете використовувати різні типи магічних атак. Перемикайте різні здібності за допомогою кнопки [Secondary]. Щоб активувати здібність, використовуй кнопку [Primary]. Кожна здібність використовує певний тип боєприпасів (див. нижче) - покладіть предмети у свій інвентар, щоб використовувати їх як боєприпаси.

§nНАСТУПНІ ЗДІБНОСТІ:§r
§fАнтигравітаційна стріла§r
(Боєприпас: 1 стріла)
§6Швидка вогняна куля§r
(Боєприпас: 1 Заряд полум'я)
§eПостріл спектральною енергією§r
(Кредл: 1 Світлокам'яний пил)
§5Вогняна куля Ендер-Дракона§r
(Боєприпас: 3 Дихання дракона)

§nЗАХИСНІ ЗДІБНОСТІ:§r
§2Брудне укриття§r
(Потрібно: 16 Ґрунту)

(Потрібно: 1 Золоте яблуко)

(Потрібно: 1 Щит)
§7Големне Посилення§r
(Потрібно: 1 Залізний блок)

§oПРИМІТКА:
Залізні големи, яких ви викликаєте, будуть готові повернутися проти вас, якщо ви їх вдарите, як големи, зроблені селянами.§r
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/gold: Ви не можете їсти золоті яблука, оскільки використовуєте їх для своїх заклинань.
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/no_a: Ви віддаєте перевагу можливості пересуватися, а не носити важкі обладунки. Ви не можете носити нагрудники або наголінники будь-якого типу. Однак ваша базова швидкість пересування вища, ніж у звичайного гравця.
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/no_w: Ви не дуже добре володієте фізичною зброєю, тому маєте постійну слабкість 2 при використанні меча або сокири
power.origins-plus-plus.marshmallow/less: ви маленькі і маєте менше здоров'я
power.origins-plus-plus.marshmallow/melt: Ви плаваєте у воді, але отримуєте від неї шкоду, оскільки вона розчиняє вас.
power.origins-plus-plus.marshmallow/reso: Пийте пляшки з медом або використовуйте [Primary] з блоком меду в руці, щоб підвищити рівень цукру. Чим більше цукру ви отримуєте, тим більшими стають ваш розмір, здоров'я та шкода від атак, але ви стаєте повільнішими.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/compound_vi: Ваші великі очі пристосувалися бачити в темряві.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/easy_evasio: Being a moth has its own perks; you are naturally lighter. You are immune to fall damage and velocity-based damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/expulsion.d: You can launch yourself in the direction you are looking.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/flammable_b: Your body and wings are lightweight and cannot withstand scorching; you take much more fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/light_affin: Due to your infatuation with light, you gain various buffs around different light sources.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/overwhelmin: Your eyes are only used to darkness and low light; the sun is too much for you to comprehend. You feel overwhelmed and weakened in its presence.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/short.name: Short
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/boost.d: You can flap your wings to give you a small upwards movement when flying.
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/lantern: When nearby a lantern, you get Regeneration.
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/no_food: You can only eat leather and rabbit hide.
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/small.d: You are smaller and have fewer hearts.
Armor weighs you down; at most, you can only wear a mix of iron and chainmail.
When nearby a soul lantern, you get Mining Fatigue.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/hi: You can activate a higher jump, but you lose hunger a lot faster. You also take extra fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/ra: You are able to lunge forward at a high speed. Attacking something while lunging at it will deal extra damage and knock it into the air.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/th: It is easier to live in colder biomes with your thick wool coat, making you faster. In hot biomes, however, you overheat and become slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/to: У вас більше здоров'я, ніж у людини.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/a_mouses_l: Ви дуже маленькі; через ваше тендітне тіло у вас набагато менше здоров'я, ніж у людини.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/mischievou: Миші швидкі; ви можете долати великі відстані за короткий проміжок часу.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/mob_ally.d: Зомбі, Скелети та Кріпери - ваші союзники, і вони не нападуть на вас.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/ride.name: Riding
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/yoink.desc: When hit by an opponent, there is a chance to replace their currently held item with a wooden hoe.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/yoink.name: Yoink
power.origins-plus-plus.ninetails/launch: Propel yourself in the direction you are looking.
power.origins-plus-plus.ninetails/pocket: You can store up to [9] items in your mouth that you keep upon death.
power.origins-plus-plus.ninetails/willow: [Save Toolbar Activator] You are able to shoot fireballs.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/air_s: You faster than normal in the air thanks to your affinity with it.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/bysta: To act is to interfere, and thus you deal massively reduced direct damage due to your reluctance.
Fire is bright, garish, and violent. An antithesis to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/float: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can float (but it is too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/rayca: Aim at an entity to strike it with a sudden crippling terror, afflicting Wither.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/toggl: You can toggle seeing entities through blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/alrea: Your skin is already made out of iron, so you cannot wear any armor that is not better than iron armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/boili: You will catch fire due to overheating in very hot biomes.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/effec: You do not suffer from any negative status effects.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/heavy: Due to your iron skin, you are heavy, strong, and slow.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/no_re: You will not regenerate any health without the Regeneration status effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/overh: You overheat easily as a robot, so you take extra fire and lava damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/rapid: [Load Toolbar Activator] You are a sentry now; be careful; you are dangerous!
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/regen: Activate self-regeneration if you do not have enough health.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/steel: Your steel skin gives you the feel of a robot, and solid metal comes through your blood and becomes electricity.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/stron: You can break natural stone much faster due to your metal fists.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/tank_: Due to your steel skin, you have more health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/unexh: Because you are a robot, you do not get exhausted or hungry at all.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/water: You are a robot, so you do not need any oxygen.
power.origins-plus-plus.pixie/bite_sized: You are now four times smaller with five less hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.pixie/effect_glo: Being a being of pure fondness gives you permanent luck and a warming aura.
power.origins-plus-plus.pixie/flying.des: You do not need to use fireworks, as you can gain a forwards and upwards boost using your magic.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/dash.descrip: You can dash and get stronger and faster for a short time.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/dash.name: Dashing Supremacy
You can charge up your energy and distribute it to jump really high.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/jump_boost.d: You have a permanent Jump Boost & Slow Falling.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/no_food.desc: You can only eat flowers, leaves, grass, saplings, wheat, and hay bales for saturation.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/no_food.name: No Food
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/ram.descript: If you attack someone while sprinting, you ram them, giving you bonus knockback on that attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/ram.name: Ram
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/bite.desc: Ваш сильний укус дозволяє вам наносити трохи більше шкоди.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/bite.name: Сила укусу
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/higher_ju: You jump higher when you are sprinting due to your strong legs.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/light_arm: Since you are a fairly light creature, you cannot wear armor that is too heavy, so you cannot wear anything above iron armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/pounce.de: You can jump forward into the direction you are looking at.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/small.des: Як нащадок велоцираптора, ви трохи менші за середньостатистичну людину.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/smaller_b: Через те, що ваше тіло менше, ви більш крихкі.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/nimble_limbs: Ви швидкий звір, від природи більш швидкий, ніж більшість, і здатні атакувати швидше, ніж інші.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/nocturnal_ey: Ваші очі не звикли до сонячного світла; якщо ви перебуваєте під денним світлом, ви будете страждати від сліпоти.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/rats_eyes.de: Ваші очі добре пристосувалися до темряви, що дозволяє вам чудово бачити. Але вода призводить до погіршення зору.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/slow_swimmer: Ви маленькі, і ваші лапи не пристосовані для плавання; ви повільно рухаєтесь у воді.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/tail_whip.de: Ви здатні давати своїм атакам сильну віддачу.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/vicious_bite: Ви можете використати свої пацючі здібності, щоб завдати потужного укусу.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/attribut: Ви на 100% стійкі до відкидання і, природно, отримуєте трохи менше шкоди.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/axe_stre: Ви отримуєте силу, коли тримаєте сокиру.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/bad_omen: Щоразу, коли гравець вбиває вас, він отримує ефект «Погана прикмета».
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/clumsy.d: Не можна використовувати щити, луки та арбалети.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/dash.des: You are able to dash forward, giving you a chance to hit your enemies and sending them farther away.
You get tired faster than normal due to your size.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/fear.des: The golems can sense your kind, so they know what you are up to (and do not take chances...).
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/hard_hit: Ваша величезна сила змушує ваші удари вражати ворогів.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/heavy_ar: You cannot wear any armor below diamond.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/heavy_fo: You trample farmland unless you are sneaking.
You are larger than the average person.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/slowness: Your species is heavy and bulky. You are permanently slowed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/team.des: Other pillagers are passive towards you because you are a relative to them.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/thick_sk: Your natural bulk gives you increased health and armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/vexy.des: You can summon a vex to fight for you, but they will die after some time.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/bamboo: You are able to consume bamboo!
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/cute.d: You can freeze all mobs in a 30-block radius because of how adorable you are.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/flamma: Your fur makes you so fluffy! but it also means you take more fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/jungle: Your homeland is the jungle; therefore, you spawn in one.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/lazy.d: You move slower during the day because of your laziness.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/noctur: You spend most of your waking hours at night, allowing you to see better in the dark.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/sharp_: Your claws and agility allow you to scale and climb blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/lig: Your need for agile movements while working with crops is harder when wearing heavy armor. You prefer only to use leather armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/nim: You are fragile from working in the fields, so you have less health than humans.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/nou: You direct the earth's nutrients toward crops. Growing them in a matter of seconds.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/pac: You prefer escaping to fighting. Your attacks are weaker, and there is a chance enemy attacks will leave you stunned.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/pho: This allows plants to get nutrients from the sun.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/str: Close proximity to farmland makes you feel at home and gives you Regeneration.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/the: You can summon a random passive or neutral mob.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/city_m: Walking on purpur blocks (and variants) will increase your armor as memories of your home come back.
One can only pass through the fabric of space so many times before it takes a toll on their body. You have far fewer hearts than the average human.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/incomp: The Nether rejects your essence, burning it the moment you enter. If you have at least one armor piece with Fire Protection II, this effect will recede.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/invert: Warp the essence of nearby ender pearls, making their wielder instantly teleport to them.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/no_foo: Ви можете їсти лише перлини Енду, будучи наполовину ендерменом.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/no_pea: Оскільки ви споживаєте перлини Енду, вам здається безглуздим витрачати їх на кидання.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/portal: Ви здатні розривати простір і час, створюючи розлом. Увійшовши в нього, ви зможете літати та проходити крізь блоки навколо розлому. Ви можете мати лише один розлом одночасно. Стовп світла від маяка неподалік допомагає вам не заблукати в розломі та дає силу просуватися далі. увімк/вимк проходження крізь блоки за допомогою [Завантажити активатор панелі інструментів].
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/return: Якщо ви отримуєте смертельний удар, він буде відвернений, а ви повернетеся до свого активного розлому.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/turn_p: З уламка аметисту та кам’яної цегли ви можете створити блок пурпуру.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/water_: Вода руйнує вашу шкіру, через що ви дуже швидко відчуваєте голод. Якщо запас голоду вичерпано, замість нього втрачається здоров’я.
Оскільки ви належите до різновиду драконів, ваш зір є гострішим. Ви можете короткочасно бачити істот у радіусі 32 блоків.
Ви звикли до отрути, сповільнення та слабкості, тому маєте шанс позбутися їхніх ефектів.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/dark_color.d: Ваша луска має сірий відтінок, через що ви виглядаєте злегка сірим.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/friendly_eye: Ендермени звикли до вас, тому погляд на них не спричиняє їхньої агресії.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/healing_poti: Ви звикли лише до зілля, яке завдає шкоди; зцілювальні зілля на вас не діють.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/heavy_scales: Ваше крилате прискорення зменшується, коли рівень здоров’я або голоду надто низький, а також якщо ви носите важку броню.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/lift_off.des: Ви можете запустити себе в повітря.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/natural_prot: Ваша луска забезпечує природний захист, даруючи вам додаткове здоров'я.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/so_much_weig: Оскільки ви важчі, ви отримуєте більше шкоди при падінні.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/sparkly.name: Блискучий
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/winged.descr: Ви можете рухати себе вперед за допомогою крил, щоб розвинути велику швидкість.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/winged.name: Крилате прискорення
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/cold: Your innate land is the hot desert, so you are at a disadvantage in the cold.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/fles: There is not a lot to eat in the desert, so you have grown to like rotten and raw flesh and get more nutrients from it, but cooked meats do not taste as good to you and so nourish you less.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/heat: Your time in the hot desert has made you immune to fire.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/no_h: From your time in the desert living with Husks, you have gained immunity to the Hunger status effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/sand: Your skin blends in with the sand.
You can phase through sandy blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/b: When exposed to light, you temporarily lose your sight. You can recover by hiding in dark spaces!
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/d: When in dark spaces you receive a boost to most stats and can see more clearly.
During the daytime, you receive debuffs as you cannot merge with the shadows around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/n: You do not need to eat food, as after hundreds of years your body has become adept at conserving energy. You regenerate infinitely, but slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/s: You become a shadow, allowing you to instantly move [15] blocks in front of you.
You are darker and more transparent than most entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/behind_yo: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can use shadows to creep up on others, using their shadow to appear behind them.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/cloud.des: You can transform yourself into dark energy and pass through blocks, but it is too unstable to stay in that form for long.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/fragile.d: You have less health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/hunger.de: Because eating food is not an option (and you are a shadow), you are able to regain your hunger when in dark areas. This costs some shadow points and fills half your hunger bar.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/invisibil: In low light conditions, you become invisible, but moonlight and sunlight expose you. You also cannot wear armor above iron without being revealed.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/night_vis: Your eyes are accustomed to the dark, so you have permanent night vision.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/no_food.d: You are a shadow, so you cannot eat food.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/sun_weakn: The sun produces a lot of light, meaning you are weak to it. You gain Slowness and Weakness and start to burn when exposed to its harsh rays.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/arachnid: §0You are able to climb up any kind of wall, not just ladders.
§0You are slightly smaller than normal, you are dark gray, have reduced health, and take more damage from Bane of Arthropods.
§0If you hit an enemy, they will get stuck in a cobweb.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/avian/fr: §fWhile under Y=86, you deal less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/avian/he: §fYou are slightly smaller than normal and have slightly fewer hearts than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/avian/sl: §fYou have the Slow Falling effect permanently.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/blazebor: §cYou take no fire damage for 10 seconds, then take reduced fire damage.
§cYou are orange and have slightly fewer hearts than a human.
§cYou take damage while in contact with water.
§cYou deal less damage unless in the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/elytrian: §7Being somewhere with a low ceiling will weaken you and make you slower.
§7You deal more damage while flying, but less while not flying.
§7You have slightly fewer hearts than a human and are a light gray color.
§7You can launch yourself into the air.
§7You take a lot more damage from falling and flying into blocks.
§7Your fragile body makes you take more damage.
§7You have elytra wings without needing to equip any.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/enderian: §5Your skin is darker than most, you have slightly fewer hearts than a human, you are slightly taller than normal, and you are slightly thinner than normal.
§5While not in the End, you deal slightly less damage.
§5You take damage while in contact with water.
§5You can reach blocks and entities slightly further away.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/h: §6You are small enough to sneak under a one-block space, but you have reduced health.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/j: §6You are able to jump higher by jumping while sprinting.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/n: §6You can slightly see in the dark when not in water.
§6You never take fall damage, no matter from which height you fall.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/w: §6You don’t deal any damage, and you mine a lot slower unless you have Strength.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/merling/: §3You can mine blocks underwater, but on land you mine blocks slower.
§3You can breathe underwater, but not on land.
§3You are slightly smaller than normal, you’re blue, have reduced health, and take more damage from Impaling.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/no_elytr: You cannot equip an elytra; you already have a whole form for that!
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/phantom/: You can phase through walls for a short time before needing to recharge. When phasing, you are invisible, but you use exhaust quickly and mine slower.
You burn in sunlight unless you are phasing or are invisible.
You are translucent and have reduced health.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shift_ba: Switch between sub-origins by holding an origin's special item and pressing [Secondary].
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shulk/ar: §dEven without wearing armor, your skin provides natural armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shulk/he: §dYou are purple, have less health, are shorter than a human, but are also slightly wider.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shulk/no: §dYou can’t use shields, bows, or crossbows.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/bite.name: Snek Bite
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/health.des: You have the health of a snek.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/intimidate: You can intimidate your enemies by hissing.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/lunge.desc: [Shift + Jump] Sneks can lunge onto prey.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/lunge.name: Snekling Lunge
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/antivo: You are unable to eat the physical food like those with flesh.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/empty_: When your Soul Well drops below 25%, you will be exhausted and require food quicker than normal. If you drop to 0%, you will begin to die due to being an empty husk.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/energi: When your Soul Well is above 25% energy, you will gain buffs: at 25%, you gain Night Vision and Speed; at 50%, you gain Haste; and at 100%, you gain Strength.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/glowin: Your eyes are those of a soul and not designed for those of flesh. You struggle to see the world the same as others.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/lightw: Due to being half physical, your weight is much lesser compared to living; this means gravity and laws of the world do not affect you as much as those with flesh.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/resour: As a half-soul being, you need to fuel your soul by attacking entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/shader: As a Soul-Seer, you can see the souls of entities through all objects.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/soul_d: Due to being a half-soul being, you are unstable by nature. When injured or sprinting, you will use up your Soul-Well.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/soul_s: Thanks to your soul-like body, you satiate yourself and fuel your Soul-Well when attacking entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/telepo: Due to your soul-like body, you can teleport to any entity you can see.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/transp: As a soul-like being, you are weak to the physical world. Your health is half of what those with flesh have.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/accursed: You are but a remnant of your former self, so you have much less health.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/archange: As a former archangel, you are slightly larger and have longer arms.
After millennia of fighting and the corruption of The Devil, you adapted to the flames and developed Hellfire immunity.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/ethereal: As a former heavenly being, both hunger and gravity are trivial to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/fallen.d: Objects too solid are hard to dematerialize. Iron, diamond, and netherite armor cannot be worn, and shields are unusable. The curse erodes any wings, so elytras are also useless.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/flesh_cr: You abhor any food that touches no blood. Only meat can be consumed. Human flesh also satiates your hunger more, even if it is rotten.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/ravenous: Your hunger grows. You are thrice as hungry.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/soul_dev: This was once a holy ability used to smite demons, but the curse has corrupted it into a sinister form. Devour the souls of your enemies on hit to regain a small amount of health.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/soul_sac: Consume 3 HP and fill the bar by [200] Spectre points (if the bar is not already full).
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/spectre_: As one who dwells in both light and dark, unleash power that rivals gods. If the 'Spectre Infinite' bar is full, gain Speed, Resistance, and Haste.

Initial: Purify all effects and lunge forwards. While active and bar not empty: You are invisible and invincible, but you are unable to hit mobs. Can pass through mobs and most blocks. You fly faster, and to descend/ascend you can double-tap space for creative flight. Consumes 2 Spectre points every tick. If deactivated: Gain Strength III for one second.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/transluc: The ghastly curse makes you slightly translucent.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/water_lo: The density of water restricts your movements. You swim three times slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/weakened: The cold weakens your protection against the curse. The decay by the curse deals damage to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/heart: Because you are a spirit, you have lost a life, giving you only nine hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/high_: You have to sleep above Y=70.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/horn_: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can hide items in your horns that do not drop on death.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/mist_: You can summon a big mist cloud around you that starts to suffocate everything around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/phase: You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
Your attacks cause undead mobs to decompose faster for a short amount of time after being hit.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/decomp: Since you are a decomposer, you are immune to the Wither, Poison, and Hunger status effects.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/fire_d: You take much more fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/health: You have less health, but at least you have more than before.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/jockey: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/light_: Due to your fragile mushroom cap, you can only wear armor up to iron level.
Тепер, коли ви стали більшими, ви можете впоратися з бронею до діамантового рівня.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/poison: Вторинна здатність: Розповсюджуйте навколо себе спори, які отруюють усіх сутностей в радіусі 4 блоків.
Після еволюції ви поширюєте навколо себе сильніші спори, які вражають усіх сутностей поблизу отрутою II і висушування у радіусі 6 блоків.
Ти крихітний, бо ти лише спора.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/small_: Ти вже не спора, але все ще маленький гриб.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/updraf: Підірвіть спори в капелюсі, щоб піднятися вгору.
Підірвіть більше спор у шапці, щоб піднятися вище.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/adrenal: Ви отримуєте швидкість, силу та регенерацію, але коли вони закінчуються, у вас залишається лише два серця.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/burns.d: Ви отримуєте більше шкоди від вогню та лави.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/light_f: До стандартної швидкості бігу вас уповільнює лише пісок душ.
У вас на два серця менше, ніж зазвичай.
Ви можете використовувати луки та арбалети на повну потужність, наносячи більше шкоди, віддачі та стріляючи з більшої відстані.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/steroid: [Зберегти активатор панелі інструментів] Якщо ви нічого не тримаєте в основній руці, ви можете відновити 10 HP.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/equino: Вночі ви отримуєте Швидкість II і Силу II.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/fragil: Ви отримуєте більше шкоди від вогню та лави.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/monste: При рівні освітлення 7 або нижче ви отримуєте +50% швидкості атаки.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/stargu: When holding a Nether Star, you gain Resistance II.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/starli: Gain immunity to your daytime slowness and receive Invisibility and Night Vision; however, you are unable to attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/sunbur: During the daytime you suffer from Slowness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/ig: Water passes right through your body, so you can sprint at full speed underwater, but it also means you cannot swim.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/sk: As your soul begins to fade into memory, your skin becomes translucent.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/sp: You have a special connection with this object, allowing you to see entities through blocks while using it.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/wa: You do not require air to survive, allowing you to survive underwater indefinitely.
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/blo:
You can trap any entity in a temporary jail cell.
§6(Mana Cost: 10000)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/gra:
Shoot a grappling hook that allows you to swing and move around quicker.
§6(Mana Cost: 1000)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/hea:
You are able to generate a quick burst of healing nanites that, upon release, shoot out potent healing chemicals that will heal anyone within its radius (including yourself).
§6(Mana Cost: 10000)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/las:
You release a powerful beam of energy capable of breaking blocks.
§6(Mana Cost: 100/use [Hold])
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/nan:
Surround yourself in nanites, preventing all health loss but freezing you in place.
§6(Mana Cost: 1000/second)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/sum: Your powers are bound to the Staff of Aldo, a powerful staff first designed by the godfather of Technomancy, Aldo Aarif. Hold the staff in your offhand and [Right Click] with a conduit in your mainhand to cast the spell.
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/tec: As a Technomancer, your power to perform spells comes from natural energy sources. 'Tech Mana' as it is commonly known, is your natural source used to cast spells, but these are often bound to more technologically advanced conduits. You gain Tech Mana naturally, as the world often brings little bits of electrical energy, which you can use and convert into mana, but this process is slow. Standing on top of redstone-type blocks will absorb its energy and give you mana quicker.
Learning Technomancy is a craft of patience and sacrifice. No longer in your prime, your body worn by time, you move slower and have fewer hearts than most.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/conduc: Your body needs magic to live! Wearing any type of armor that is not golden will slowly wither you away. Since golden armor is very weak, you have come up with a solution. By using gold blocks instead of gold ingots, you can make a reinforced golden armor piece.
Wearing, holding, or being hit by anything with a curse enchantment will affect you with Wither.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/empowe: While wearing a full set of armor with Thorns III, you receive 40% less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/punchi: Being hit so many times has significantly weakened you, so you deal less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/thorns: You are protected by a strange magical aura. When hit, the attacker will get damaged by one heart; this cannot be blocked by any type of armor or shield. You are also immune to thorns-based damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/fire: Fire deals much more damage to you. Additionally, when on fire, you are afflicted with Blindness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/heal: You have two more hearts because you fight a lot.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/high: The Vishaichian love shiny objects; it is difficult for them to trade them away, annoying villagers, which oftentimes results in them increasing prices.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/natu: You are a skilled warrior, and therefore you possess abilities that increase your melee attack damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/raw_: You can only properly process raw meat.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/summ: You summon up to [3] evoker fangs on enemies around you!
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/upgr: You have more health than a human.
You are a skilled warrior, and therefore you deal extra melee attack damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/arm: You cannot use armor with protection values above chainmail.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/cha: When crouched, you regain divinity, which is used to use your abilities and enhanced attacks (you cannot attack during this time).
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/cur: When under the effect of Slowness, you get Weakness 100.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/dis: You can become invisible for a short while.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/dod: Automatically dodges the first attack you receive (with a cooldown).
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/fra: You have slightly less health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/no_: You are unable to use potions.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/smi: Your attacks link your target to the void, cleansing them of impurities.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/spe: You move a little faster than most
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/unw: You cannot use shields or ranged weapons.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/brittle: You take more damage from kinetic base sources.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/dive_at: You deal more damage when diving towards a target.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/large_a: Because your body now requires more energy, causing you to eat more often.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/light_w: Your body is weak, unable to adapt to the light sources around you, giving debuffs as you cannot merge with the shadows created by the Void.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/low_hea: As a Voidborne, your adaptability in the skies has weakened you to the dangers below; you have slightly fewer hearts than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/shadow_: When in dark spaces you receive a boost and can see better!
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/supreme: You can shape the void to help you create a shield that protects you from all damage but immobilizes you for its short duration.
When overcharged with Void Energy, you can enter the Supreme State. In this state you gain Strength and become a glass cannon that multiplies all damage dealt and received.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_ch: Being part of the void, your body weakens the further away you are from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_en: You charge your body with the essence of the Void by being near bedrock. This Void Energy is then used for all of your abilities.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_fa: Now being one with the Void, your body rebels in the End. Careful, your body still gets weakened in other dimensions.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_sh: You can call upon the Void to shield you in your time of need.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidbor: Your body has grown stronger, causing you to be able to step into the light but becoming more transparent the further you stray from the Void.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidlin: You are darker and more transparent than most entities; you also give off some particles!
You have learnt to give yourself a boost in the direction you are looking with the wings The Void has gifted you when flying.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/winged_: You struggle to stay afloat when your health or hunger is too low, or when you are wearing heavy armor. Flying boosts will exhaust you more and propel you less when wearing heavy armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.volcanic-dragon/: Hunger goes down a bit quicker.
Your scales are hard and tough to cut through, giving you natural armor.
Your natural home is near lava. So, you spawn in the Nether.
You gain Slowness and Weakness in cold biomes.
Because of your lineage, you have slightly more health.
You are able to boost with the flames that surround you.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/as_s: Crouch while falling to fall more slowly.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/deat: You gain life by damaging or killing others.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/floa: You can float (but it is too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/ghos: Villagers will not trade with you, and Iron Golems attack you on sight.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/phas: You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/righ: Smite works against you; iron and gold items deal extra damage to you, and you cannot wear iron or gold armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/spit: Any mobs/players that hit you with melee attacks will receive Slowness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/the_: You can see in the dark.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/touc: Applies Wither to anyone you hit.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/wail: Sing your Death Knell to damage and wither all who stand in front of you!
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/bag.des: A wanderer always needs a trusty pouch with them.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/cross.d: Due to your body being used to travel, you became a little weaker to fire.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/healing: When within two blocks of a light source, you start to heal. Soul variants satiate you instead.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/leather: Wearing leather armor gives you additional armor, Speed, and an attack damage buff.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/night.d: During the night you become faster but also weaker. Weakness can be combated by holding a shield at the expense of losing your speed boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/trade.d: You are merchant; prices go down when you are around.
power.origins-plus-plus.wandering-spirit: When critical hitting something, you have a 25% chance to accidentally deal damage to yourself instead.
Damage Glitch
Fire exorcises you, so you take extra fire damage.
Fire Weakness
When in dark areas your vision sucks, so you get Blindness (unless you have Night Vision).
Need Glasses
You can summon a great storm that will strike lightning around you. (Uses hunger)
Lightning Charge
You cannot be affected by lightning.
Lightning Invulnerability
[Load Toolbar Activator] You can summon a lightning strike where you are looking. (Uses hunger).
Electrokinesis
You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
Phase
Due to your nature, you have learnt to move faster than most. This allows you to mine and move faster than others.
Quick Hands and Feet
You are always shaking. The thought of the approaching night always on your mind.
Shaking
You can switch between small, normal, and large sizes.
Morphing
At night you are afraid of the dark, so you are inflicted with Slowness and Weakness (unless you have Night Vision).
The Darkness
You deal more damage with axes.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/born_in_: You are connected to fire, so you have permanent Fire Resistance.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/hungry.d: It is very hunger-consuming to fight so much.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/moonligh: Sun = fire and fire = good, so you are weakened during nighttime when there is no sun.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/no_range: You are inexperienced with any ranged weapons, so you avoid using them.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/not_a_ra: You are more skilled using swords and axes. Bows deal more damage to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/philza_r: Elytrians deal much more damage when attacking you.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/strong.d: You have a lot of experience in wars, so you have extra health.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/swordsma: Swords feel natural—you are very skilled with bladed weaponry, so deal more damage with it.
Adrenaline rushes through your veins when the thought of a good battle comes to mind, causing you to deal more damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/blind.des: You cannot see well when not in darkness as you have evolved to live in pitch black. When in very dark spaces, you can see normally.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/echolocat: You can shriek to detect nearby mobs and cause them to glow.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/health.de: You have additional hearts and permanent Strength.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/phase.des: You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/size.desc: You are shaped like a warden: tall and wide.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/size.name: Warden's Body
power.origins-plus-plus.warforged/rust.d: You start to rust when wet, causing you to get Slowness and Weakness in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.warforged/scotop: You have night vision, allowing you to see in the dark.
power.origins-plus-plus.warforged/weapon: Your body is a weapon, allowing you to do more damage to enemies.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/ender_che: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can access a custom "Ender Chest" to store items that do not drop on death.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/fall_brea: Press the sneak key to stop your fall. Make sure to time it correctly.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/food.desc: Due to your time spent in the End, you can eat end blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/food.name: Reliable Food Source
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/passive_e: Endermen will not become aggressive towards you (unless you attack them).
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/portality: [Primary/Secondary] You can summon a portal. When you have two portals, you can teleport between them by standing close to them. (Works across dimensions.)
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/random_te: When you take damage from anything other than water, you randomly teleport nearby.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/spawn.des: You come from and belong to the End.
[Load Toolbar Activator] Teleport wherever you are looking (within 32 blocks).
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/weak.desc: You have much less health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/weak.name: Weak
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/art: Being near paintings satisfies your inner artist, replenishing your hunger slowly.
You learnt a special recipe to make the constant painting easier on your resources. You can craft wool with just two string.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/era: Erase the color of the entity you are looking at. Use [Shift] too to self-cast.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/fir: You take significantly more fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/fra: Due to neglecting your physical health, you have slightly fewer hearts than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/mag:
With the respective dye in hand, click to fire a ray of §4red§r, §3blue§r or §2green§r energy that colors entities around the impact. (Syntax is Attacker -> Target) 
§3Blue§r -> §3Blue§r or §4Red§r -> §4Red§r pulls the target entity to the attacker.
§3Blue§r -> §4Red§r or §4Red§r -> §3Blue§r applies extra knockback to the attack.
§2Green§r + §4Red§r creates §6Yellow§r, which causes the entity to glow brightly and be seen through walls.
§3Blue§r -> §2Green§r heals the target entity and creates a water block at its feet for a moment.
§2Green§r -> §3Blue§r steals health from the target entity to restore health for the attacker.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/no_: Food restores no hunger for you, as you are beyond it. Only paintings satisfy you.
You cannot stand your colorful nature being suppressed, so you are immune to Invisibility.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/pai: One of your creations is a set of armor painted with a gray color, which grants you innate armor. However, other armor is barely effective.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/rea: Fire a ray that reanimates the first painting it hits, turning the entities in them alive. They will be passive to you. (This does not work for all paintings)
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/ber: As having a fox also being your ancestor, you have grown a strong liking to berries, so they fill you more.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/fea: As you are related to the Wither, undead mobs are afraid of you, so they will not attack you (this includes the Wither).
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/flo: You float instead of jumping (but it is too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/hea: Your body has withered your hearts away.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/hom: Your natural spawn is the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/imm: Due to living in the Nether you have grown an immunity to the Wither status effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/pro: Your wither ancestor has passed on the ability to be more resistant to attacks and make you immune to projectiles when on half health.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/qui: Due to constantly running from hunters, you have evolved a natural movement speed bonus.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/sec: Due to one of your ancestors being the Wither, you have inherited its ability to shoot wither skulls.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/sma: One of your ancestors is a fox, so you are a bit smaller than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/und: You count as an undead mob, so you take increased damage from Smite and some potion effects are reversed.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/wit: Your claws are filled with a dangerous disease, so melee damage withers your enemies.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-skeleti: You are immune to the Wither status effect.
You spawn in the Nether, and like your brothers and sisters, you spawn in a fortress with them.
Blazes, Wither Skeletons, and Skeletons are all your allies and will not attack you.
Due to your proficiency with them, stone swords do significantly increased damage.
You take increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with Smite.
You are naturally taller than humans.
Inflicts Wither on your opponent for a short period of time after hitting them.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/ball.desc: With your magic you summon a fireball.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/ball.name: Fireball Spell
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/broom.des: When holding a stick you get Slow Falling.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/flight_ki: When holding a feather you gain Levitation.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/health.de: The extra magic in your body goes to your health.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/immune.de: You are immune to Poison, Wither, and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/light.des: With a stick in your hand, you summon lightning on whoever you hit.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/magic.des: Due to your body constantly expelling magic, you have permanent Regeneration.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/old.descr: You are slower due to being old, and your frail skin takes more damage from explosions.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/old.name: Old
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/respect.d: Illagers respect you because of your wise knowledge and will not attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/second.de: When you receive a fatal blow, you have a totem-like effect (with a cooldown).
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/skin.desc: Due to your sensitive skin, you can only wear armor up to iron.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/skin.name: Sensitive Skin
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/skulls.de: [Save Toolbar Activator] Summon a skull bomb.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/vex2.desc: Vexes love you because you are a kind wizard and so will protect you.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/vex2.name: Ghost Summoner
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/villagers: Villagers recognize you as a wise wizard, thus lowering their trades.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/why.descr: You cannot use totems because why should you? You can cheat death by yourself!
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/why.name: Why?
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/claws.d: You have large, powerful claws, allowing you to do more damage to enemies.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/night_v: You have night vision, allowing you to see in the dark.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/project: You can breathe out large clouds of poison.
Because you are a descendant of wyverns, you have a weaker body and thus cannot wear armor with protection higher than chainmail.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/size.de: Similar to most other dragons, you are taller than most.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/water.d: Your wings get heavier when they are wet, causing you to be afflicted with Slowness and Weakness in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/wind.de: You can use your large wings to flap!
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/acro: You have Speed and Slow Falling.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/heli: When in harsh lighting conditions, you get Blindness and Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/nice: Because you are so nice to everyone, Creepers, Spiders, Skeletons, and Zombies will not attack you unless provoked. You also get good discounts for villager trades.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/supe: You go into a very resistant state that makes you invulnerable to any type of damage, and you deal much more damage, but after you use this ability, you are afflicted with Slowness, Weakness, and Hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/tall: You are used to being under taller roofs, so when you are right under a block, you are afflicted with Weakness and Hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/weak: Because your arms are weak, you cannot really wear netherite armor and so are afflicted with Slowness II when wearing it.
